title: Outrageous fortune
creator_credit: Arthur Hiller, Robert W. Cort, Ted Field, Interscope communications and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: A madcap comedy involving a menage a trois and espionage. Two actresses who don’t get along with each other, Sandy (Bette Midler) and Lauren (Shelley Long) find out they are both dating the same man, Michael (Peter Coyote). All hell breaks loose when they discover that Michael is a spy working for a foreign government and that he has implicated them both in his schemes. Cast includes Robert Prosky, John Schuck, George Carlin.
